fields.fieldDescription: The Record ID (RID) of the amendment.
The object state of the amendment
The code indicating whether amendment voting is deal-based or facility-based.
Indicates whether or not auto release applies to this amendment. This field is not used and should be deleted from the database.
The Record ID (RID) for the customer chosen as the deal borrower.
User ID that last updated this row.  This is a foreign key to VLS_USER_PROFILE.UPT_UID_USERID.
User ID that created this row.  This is a foreign key to VLS_USER_PROFILE.UPT_UID_USERID.
Timestamp from when this row was last updated.
Timestamp from when this row was created.
Indicates whether or not the deal borrower is the primary borrower in the deal.
The Record ID (RID) for the deal associated with this borrower.

"The Record ID (RID) of the deal or facility on which the voting is based.  If the user selects a facility on which amendment voting will be based, the facility RID will appear here.  Otherwise (when no facility is selected), the Deal RID will ap"
Host bank net position (contractual position net of participations) in the deal or facility on which amendment voting will be based.
